description:
This course will show you how to get your accounts done for the year in the quickest way possible.

  • Don't spend days of boring data entry and fumbling through receipts. Using this process will take a few hours at most, even for a complicated small business.
  • The course is short because you don't need to know all about accounting and bookkeeping but just the minimum to get your accounts done.
  • You will save thousands in accounting and bookkeeping fees. Your accountant will just need to finish off the accounts for tax purposes.

This course is designed for entrepreneurs, small business owners, consultants and freelancers who are late with their accounts and need to get the Tax Man off their backs.
title: Super Fast Accounting - the fastest way to do your books
